description: List all related items for an incident record.

parameters.name: incidentRecordArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the incident record containing the listed related items.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: The pagination token to use when requesting the next set of items. If there are no additional items to return, the string is null.

nested_items.name: generatedId
nested_items.description: A unique ID for a RelatedItem.

nested_items.name: arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the related item, if the related item is an Amazon resource.

nested_items.name: metricDefinition
nested_items.description: The metric definition, if the related item is a metric in Amazon CloudWatch.

nested_items.name: pagerDutyIncidentDetail
nested_items.description: Details about an incident that is associated with a PagerDuty incident.

nested_items.name: autoResolve
nested_items.description: Indicates whether to resolve the PagerDuty incident when you resolve the associated Incident Manager incident.

nested_items.name: id
nested_items.description: The ID of the incident associated with the PagerDuty service for the response plan.

nested_items.name: secretId
nested_items.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services Secrets Manager secret that stores your PagerDuty key, either a General Access REST API Key or User Token REST API Key, and other user credentials.

nested_items.name: url
nested_items.description: The URL, if the related item is a non-Amazon Web Services resource.

nested_items.name: title
nested_items.description: The title of the related item.
